original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato udāyissa purāṇadutiyikā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmataḥ udāyissa purāṇadutiyikā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā hoti

original: Sā āyasmato udāyissa santike abhikkhaṇaṁ āgacchati, āyasmāpi udāyī tassā bhikkhuniyā santike abhikkhaṇaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: sā āyasmataḥ udāyissa santike abhikkhaṇam āgacchati āyasmā api udāyī tassāḥ bhikkhuniyāḥ santike abhikkhaṇam gacchati

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī tassā bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappesi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī tassā bhikkhuniyā saddhim ekaḥ ekāya rahaḥ nisajjam kappesi

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā udāyī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappessatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmai udāyī bhikkhuniyā saddhim ekaḥ ekāya rahaḥ nisajjam kappessati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, udāyi, bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappesī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tvam udāyi bhikkhuniyā saddhim ekaḥ ekāya rahaḥ nisajjam kappesi iti

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappessasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva moghapurisa bhikkhuniyā saddhim ekaḥ ekāya rahaḥ nisajjam kappessasi
neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhim ekaḥ ekāya rahaḥ nisajjam kappeyya pācittiyam ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti
bhikkhu ca iva hoti bhikkhunī ca

original: na sakkā hoti akkhiṁ vā nikhaṇīyamāne bhamukaṁ vā ukkhipīyamāne sīsaṁ vā ukkhipīyamāne passituṁ.
analyzed: na sakkā hoti akkhim vā nikhaṇīyamāne bhamukam vā ukkhipīyamāne sīsam vā ukkhipīyamāne passitu

original: bhikkhuniyā nisinnāya bhikkhu upanisinno vā hoti upanipanno vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyā nisinnāya bhikkhu upanisinnaḥ vā hoti upanipannaḥ vā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Bhikkhu nisinne bhikkhunī upanisinnā vā hoti upanipannā vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: bhikkhu nisinne bhikkhunī upanisinnā vā hoti upanipannā vā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Ubho vā nisinnā honti ubho vā nipannā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ubho vā nisinnāḥ honti ubho vā nipannāḥ āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Raho rahosaññī eko ekāya nisajjaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: rahaḥ rahaḥ saññī ekaḥ ekāya nisajjam kappeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Raho vematiko eko ekāya nisajjaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: rahaḥ vematikaḥ ekaḥ ekāya nisajjam kappeti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Raho arahosaññī eko ekāya nisajjaṁ kappeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: rahaḥ a rahaḥ saññī ekaḥ ekāya nisajjam kappeti āpatti pācittiyassa
